text: Alf Cranner (25 October 1936 - 3 March 2020) was a major Norwegian folk singer, lyricist and painter. He was an important person in the field of Norwegian folk music in the 1960s. (in Norwegian) (in Norwegian) He was known for several popular folk music versions and folk tunes, including these: "Å, den som var en løvetann". The folk song "Din tanke er fri", is Cranner translation of the German "Die Gedanken sind frei". ==References== Category:Writers from Oslo Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Norwegian singers Category:Norwegian composers
title: Alf Cranner
